programme.title: ERC 2025
programme.desc: Με χρονιά εκκίνησης το 1953, το Ευρωπαϊκό Πρωτάθλημα Ράλι της FIA είναι το απόλυτο πεδίο προπόνησης για τα νέα ταλέντα που στοχεύουν στην κορυφή του αθλήματος.

programme.title: Εκπομπή Grand Prix 2025
programme.desc: Η εκπομπή για όλες τις εξελίξεις στα πρωταθλήματα μηχανοκίνητου αθλητισμού που φιλοξενεί η COSMΟΤΕ TV (MotoGP, WRC, ERC, DTM).

programme.title: GT World Challenge Europe 2025
programme.desc: Το GT World Challenge Europe είναι μια σειρά αγώνων από τροποποιημένα αυτοκίνητα που ακολουθούν τους κανονισμούς GT3 της FIA.

programme.title: DTM
programme.desc: Το Γερμανικό Πρωτάθλημα Τουρισμού φιλοξενεί τροποποιημένα αυτοκίνητα που κυκλοφορούν στον δρόμο, αποτελείται από 16 αγώνες σε 8 αγωνιστικά διήμερα. Η διοργάνωση έχει ως βάση της τη Γερμανία, με γύρους να διεξάγονται και σε άλλα μέρη της Ευρώπης.

programme.title: Στιγμιότυπα: 2025 Extreme H
programme.desc: Το FIA Extreme H World Cup είναι το πρώτο διεθνές πρωτάθλημα off-road στο οποίο τα εκτός δρόμου αγωνιστικά τροφοδοτούνται αποκλειστικά με υδρογόνο.

programme.title: ERC 2025
programme.desc: Με χρονιά εκκίνησης το 1953, το Ευρωπαϊκό Πρωτάθλημα Ράλι της FIA είναι το απόλυτο πεδίο προπόνησης για τα νέα ταλέντα που στοχεύουν στην κορυφή του αθλήματος.

programme.title: Αθλητικά Στιγμιότυπα
programme.desc: Παρακολουθήστε τις καλύτερες φάσεις από τον κόσμο των σπορ.

programme.title: Motorsports: MotoGP 2025
programme.desc: Το Παγκόσμιο Πρωτάθλημα FIM MotoGP 2025 περιλαμβάνει 11 ομάδες και συνολικά 22 αναβάτες, που διεκδικούν τον τίτλο μέσα από 22 Γκραν Πρι. Περιγραφή: Δημήτρης Διατσίδης.

programme.title: Εκπομπή Grand Prix 2025
programme.desc: Η εκπομπή για όλες τις εξελίξεις στα πρωταθλήματα μηχανοκίνητου αθλητισμού που φιλοξενεί η COSMΟΤΕ TV (MotoGP, WRC, ERC, FIA WORLD RALLYCROSS, DTM).

programme.title: MotoGP 2025 - Στιγμιότυπα
programme.desc: Το MotoGP, το παγκόσμιο πρωτάθλημα μοτοσυκλέτας, προσφέρει πολλές συγκινήσεις. Παρακολουθήστε μια συμπυκνωμένη εκδοχή όσων συνέβησαν σε μια από τις κούρσες του 2025.

programme.title: Motorsports: Moto3 2025
programme.desc: Γκραν Πρι Βαλένθια (1ες Ελεύθερες Δοκιμές). Το Παγκόσμιο Πρωτάθλημα FIM Moto3 του 2025 συγκεντρώνει 13 ομάδες από 2 κατασκευαστές, αλλά και 27 αναβάτες, οι οποίοι διαγωνίζονται σε 22 Γκραν Πρι. Περιγραφή: Θανάσης Κελάφης.

programme.title: Motorsports: Moto2 2025
programme.desc: Γκραν Πρι Βαλένθια (1ες Ελεύθερες Δοκιμές). Το Παγκόσμιο Πρωτάθλημα FIM Moto2 2025 περιλαμβάνει 15 ομάδες από 3 κατασκευαστές και συνολικά 30 αναβάτες. Ο τελικός νικητής θα κριθεί μέσα από 22 συναρπαστικά Γκραν Πρι. Περιγραφή: Θανάσης Κελάφης.

programme.title: Motorsports: MotoGP 2025

programme.title: Τένις: Nitto ATP Finals 2025
programme.desc: Φάση Ομίλων. Οι τελικοί του ATP 2025 διεξάγονται στο Τορίνο της Ιταλίας, από τις 9 έως τις 16 Νοεμβρίου 2025. Είναι το τελευταίο τουρνουά της σεζόν για τους παίκτες και τις ομάδες που βρίσκονται υψηλότερα στην κατάταξη του ATP Tour το 2025.

programme.title: Υδάτινα Σπορ: Ο Κόσμος της Ιστιοπλοΐας 2025
programme.desc: Η ιστιοπλοΐα είναι ένα πολύ ξεχωριστό άθλημα. Η εκπομπή παρουσιάζει την καρδιά της ιστιοπλοΐας, από την κομψότητα και το πρεστίζ των εκπληκτικών γιοτ μέχρι την αντοχή που χρειάζεται στους αγώνες και τον σκληρό κόσμο των αγώνων dinghy και του kite surfing.

programme.title: Sports Classics: 2025 Outdoor Specials
programme.desc: Το Outdoor Specials σας φέρνει τα πιο συναρπαστικά γεγονότα στον κόσμο των extreme sports. Από το windsurfing μέχρι την ορειβασία και από την οδήγηση αγώνων μέχρι τις καταδύσεις σπηλαίων, αυτή είναι μια σειρά που θα σας δώσει μια γενναιόδωρη δόση αδρεναλίνης.

programme.title: Beach Volley: Pro Tour Elite 16 2025
programme.desc: Το 2025 Volleyball World Beach Pro Tour είναι η τέταρτη έκδοση του παγκόσμιου πρωταθλήματος beach volley που διοργανώνεται από την FIVB για το 2025. Περιγραφή: Γιώργος Μπιτσικώκος.

programme.title: Deck the Halls on Cherry Lane
programme.desc: Three generations of neighbors on Cherry Lane experience life-changing Christmases, from a mistaken address leading to a live TV special, to a family facing their last holiday together, to best friends discovering unexpected love.

programme.title: Christmas at the Plaza
programme.desc: When historian Jessica is hired to create the Plaza's Christmas display, she finds more than facts while teaming up with handsome decorator Nick to bring the display to life.

programme.title: Mistletoe Murders: Cold War
programme.desc: After avoiding each other for one year, Emily and Sam reunite to solve the disappearance of the school chess coach, triggering echoes of Emily's past.

programme.title: Deck the Walls
programme.desc: Interior designer, Rose DeMonte, uses her skills back in her hometown to renovate a Christmas Charity Home for her brother Sal and his contractor Brysen's home flipping company.

programme.title: Trivia at St. Nick's
programme.desc: Locals compete in a Christmas bar trivia tournament at the end of the semester.

programme.title: Holiday Date
programme.desc: Brooke is dumped right before Christmas and enlists the help of actor Joel to play the role of her boyfriend for the holidays.

programme.title: Our Holiday Story
programme.desc: A loving couple shares the story of how they met and fell in love when their daughter's boyfriend comes to meet them for the first time at Christmas.

programme.title: A Royal Christmas
programme.desc: The queen (Jane Seymour) of Cordinia schemes to break up her royal son's (Stephen Hagan) romance with a seamstress (Lacey Chabert) from Philadelphia.

programme.title: One Starry Christmas
programme.desc: Sparks fly between a woman (Sarah Carter) and her bus companion (Damon Runyan) after her boyfriend (Paul Popowich) leaves her alone during Christmastime.

programme.title: You, Me & the Christmas Trees
programme.desc: An arborist falls in love with a farmer as she tries to save his trees before the town tree lighting.

programme.title: Merry & Bright
programme.desc: Merry and Bright Candy Cane Company owner Cate meets a man during the busy Christmas season and assumes he is the suitor her mother is trying to set her up with.

programme.title: Christmas on My Mind
programme.desc: Lucy Lovett wakes up holding a wedding dress and assumes she is about to marry the love her life, Zach Callahan.

programme.title: Christmas Above the Clouds
programme.desc: Eager to avoid Christmas, Ella Neezer, a CEO, books an international trip that skips the holiday, until three spirits journey Ella through her life to rediscover her Christmas spirit.

programme.title: Mistletoe Murders
programme.desc: The art world comes to Fletcher's Grove! When Sam's old partner is murdered guarding a high-profile painting, Emily teaches Sam to sleuth off the grid, and we uncover more of Emily's past.

programme.title: Mistletoe Murders
programme.desc: Emily and Sam unravel a complicated web of lies around the mysterious painting, discovering the lengths people will go to keep secrets, including Emily's; Violet crafts a special present.

programme.title: Christmas by Starlight
programme.desc: A lawyer makes a deal with the heir to a development firm to spare her family's restaurant from demolition. However, she must spend the week posing as the legal counsel his father is demanding he hire in the wake of some costly mistakes.

programme.title: Rocky Mountain Christmas
programme.desc: Sarah heads to her uncle's ranch to escape New York and the spotlight from a breakup. Returning home for the first time since her aunt passed, complications arise when Graham, a Hollywood star, arrives at the ranch to prepare for his next film.

programme.title: Round and Round
programme.desc: Rachel's stuck in a time loop, reliving the night of her parents' Hanukkah party. Can Zach, the nice boy grandma's trying to set her up with, help her make it to tomorrow?

programme.title: Scouting for Christmas
programme.desc: A single mom tries to make her daughter's Christmas special since her dad is working overseas for the holidays. She partners with her daughter's favorite baker for the Holiday Ball.

programme.title: Magic in Mistletoe
programme.desc: When Harrington Davis, author of the popular book series "Magic in Mistletoe," loses his holiday spirit, his publicist, April, must step in to help him save his career and find the magic again.

programme.title: The Mistletoe Secret
programme.desc: Aria hopes being selected for Sterling Masters' Big Holiday Adventure will save Christmas in Midway. Little does she know that Alex Bartlett is the voice behind Sterling Masters.

programme.title: A Maple Valley Christmas
programme.desc: Erica is a rancher who's spent her whole life working the family farm with her mother and sister. When Aaron arrives and disrupts her plans, she starts to question what it is she actually wants.

programme.title: Debbie Macomber's Dashing Through the Snow
programme.desc: A young woman becomes stranded in an airport at Christmastime and accepts a ride from a man who rented the last rental car in town. As they head north, a hint of romance develops when they encounter a few bumps on the road.

programme.title: Christmas Island
programme.desc: When a snowstorm diverts Kate's first private flight to Christmas Island, she must team up with an air traffic controller to secure her dream job as the family's pilot.

programme.title: Three Wise Men and a Baby
programme.desc: Three brothers get the surprise of their lives when they are forced to work together and care for a baby over the holidays.

programme.title: Three Wiser Men and a Boy
programme.desc: The Brenner brothers return and put on a holiday pageant for young Thomas while trying to cope with life's curveballs, including their mom's new boyfriend.

programme.title: Three Wisest Men
programme.desc: As life pushes their family in different directions, the Brenner boys decide they need to put on the best Christmas ever to bring everyone back together.

programme.title: Debbie Macomber's Joyful Mrs. Miracle
programme.desc: Mrs. Miracle uses Christmas magic to reunite three siblings who must decide who will inherit the family's real estate empire, following their grandmother's passing.

programme.title: Homegrown Christmas
programme.desc: When forced to work together to organize a Christmas dance for the local high school, former sweethearts find themselves rediscovering what made them fall in love all those years ago.

programme.title: A Godwink Christmas: Miracle of Love
programme.desc: Joy and Eric find a new sense of purpose -- and get a chance at love -- as they work together to build a home for a family during Christmastime.

programme.title: A Season for Family
programme.desc: Maddy's adopted son, Wesley, has just one wish for Christmas -- to meet his brother, Cody, who was adopted into a different family. Circumstances soon bring the two siblings together while sparks fly between their respective parents.

programme.title: A Novel Noel
programme.desc: A NYC book editor takes on a temporary gig running a Maine bookstore. Battling with the owners' son, she rediscovers her passion for nurturing creativity.

programme.title: A Perfect Christmas
programme.desc: Newlyweds Steve and Cynthia have a few secrets to keep as their families arrive for the holidays: he's just been laid off, and she's pregnant.

programme.title: Best Christmas Party Ever
programme.desc: A young party planner arranges a special Christmas party for a New York toy store. When a powerful corporation threatens to shut her down, she decides to follow her heart and move forward with the party plans.

programme.title: Angels and Ornaments
programme.desc: During the holidays, a mysterious co-worker (Sergio Di Zio) tries to play matchmaker for a musician (Jessalyn Gilsig) and her childhood friend (Graham Abbey).

programme.title: The Holiday Sitter
programme.desc: Sam is a workaholic bachelor who's babysitting his niece and nephew during the holidays. Completely out of his element, he recruits help from a handsome neighbor and soon finds himself in an unexpected romance.

programme.title: Debbie Macomber's Trading Christmas
programme.desc: Holiday travel leads to cross-country romances when a man (Tom Cavanagh) and a woman (Faith Ford) temporarily swap houses.

programme.title: Chateau Christmas
programme.desc: A world-renowned pianist rediscovers her passion for music after reuniting with her ex during the holidays.

programme.title: A Wish for Christmas
programme.desc: Sara prefers to be on the sidelines at work until someone steals her big idea for a Christmas initiative. She makes a wish to Santa to gain the courage to stand up for herself, and he gives her 48 hours to discover how to speak her own mind.

programme.title: A Fabled Holiday
programme.desc: Talia and her childhood best friend unexpectedly reunite in a curiously familiar-looking town that's full of Christmas spirit.

programme.title: The Christmas Quest
programme.desc: An archeologist and her ex-husband, an expert in ancient Norse languages, are sent to Iceland at Christmastime to search for the legendary treasure of the Yule Lads.

programme.title: A Christmas Tree Grows in Colorado
programme.desc: A woman who is in charge of her town's Christmas celebration must win over a firefighter to obtain a magnificent spruce tree from his property for the festivities.

programme.title: A Godwink Christmas: Second Chance, First Love
programme.desc: After 15 years, a single father moves home from Hawaii with his two sons and, through a series of coincidences -- or Godwinks, ends up stuck in traffic next to his high school sweetheart.

programme.title: Christmas in the Air
programme.desc: A no-nonsense professional organizer (Catherine Bell) learns that opposites do attract when she begins to fall for her client, a frazzled widower (Eric Close) who spends his time inventing toys.

programme.title: Lucky Christmas
programme.desc: A woman (Elizabeth Berkley) must retrieve her winning lottery ticket from the glove compartment of her stolen car.

programme.title: The Christmas Contest
programme.desc: Sparks fly between a former couple as they compete in a Christmas contest to win money for the charity of their choosing.

programme.title: My Norwegian Holiday
programme.desc: A grieving woman forges a deep connection with a Norwegian man when he discovers she has a troll figurine from his hometown. She soon agrees to accompany him to Norway to uncover the troll's origins and find her own path to healing, love and family.

programme.title: The Town Christmas Forgot
programme.desc: An upscale, urban family that can't seem to get along gets stranded in a remote, impoverished lumber town two days before Christmas.

programme.title: My Grown-Up Christmas List
programme.desc: A journalist and a military man share a special bond that grows between them over the course of several Christmases they spend together and apart.

programme.title: Charming Christmas
programme.desc: Meredith, the heir to Rossman's Department Store, reluctantly agrees to play the role of Mrs. Claus in a store. When Nick, the new store Santa Claus shows up, she experiences a little holiday magic of her own.

programme.title: Mistletoe Murders: Cold War
programme.desc: After avoiding each other for one year, Emily and Sam reunite to solve the disappearance of the school chess coach, triggering echoes of Emily's past.

programme.title: Silver Bells
programme.desc: A teenage runaway (Michael Mitchell) connects his widowed father (Tate Donovan) and a woman (Anne Heche) who lost her husband during a past Christmas holiday.

programme.title: We Need a Little Christmas
programme.desc: Facing her first Christmas as a single mother, Julie develops an unexpected friendship with an older neighbor.

programme.title: Men in Black 2
programme.desc: Two interstellar agents try to stop an alien disguised as a lingerie model from destroying the world.

programme.title: Men in Black 3
programme.desc: Agent J travels in time to M.I.B.'s early days in 1969 to stop an alien from assassinating his friend Agent K and changing history.

programme.title: Men in Black: International
programme.desc: The Men in Black have expanded to cover the globe but so have the villains of the universe. When aliens that can take the form of any human arrive on Earth, H and M embark on a globe-trotting adventure to save the agency -- and ultimately the world.

programme.title: Ambulance
programme.desc: A decorated veteran teams up with his adoptive brother to steal $32 million from a Los Angeles bank. When their getaway goes wrong, the desperate thieves hijack an ambulance that's carrying a wounded cop and an EMT worker.

programme.title: Drag Me to Hell
programme.desc: After actions trigger the loss of an old woman's home, an ambitious loan officer finds herself the victim of a curse that will damn her soul for eternity.

programme.title: State of Consciousness
programme.desc: Accused of murder, a man winds up in a shady mental facility where an experimental treatment causes a yearlong gap in his memory, leaving him unable to separate horrific hallucinations from real life.

programme.title: After Earth
programme.desc: A crash landing leaves Kitai and his father Cypher stranded on Earth, a millennium after humanity's escape. With Cypher injured, Kitai must embark on a perilous journey to signal for help.

programme.title: Drag Me to Hell
programme.desc: After actions trigger the loss of an old woman's home, an ambitious loan officer finds herself the victim of a curse that will damn her soul for eternity.

programme.title: The Purge: Election Year
programme.desc: Former Police Sergeant Barnes becomes head of security for Senator Charlie Roan, a Presidential candidate targeted for death on Purge night due to her vow to eliminate the Purge.

programme.title: Crank
programme.desc: A hit man (Jason Statham) awakes to the news that he has been poisoned and will die in an hour unless he keeps adrenaline coursing through his body.

programme.title: Men in Black 3
programme.desc: Agent J travels in time to M.I.B.'s early days in 1969 to stop an alien from assassinating his friend Agent K and changing history.

programme.title: Men in Black: International
programme.desc: The Men in Black have expanded to cover the globe but so have the villains of the universe. When aliens that can take the form of any human arrive on Earth, H and M embark on a globe-trotting adventure to save the agency -- and ultimately the world.

programme.title: Pacific Rim Uprising
programme.desc: Jake Pentecost, son of Stacker Pentecost, reunites with Mako Mori to lead a new generation of Jaeger pilots, including rival Lambert and 15-year-old hacker Amara, against a new Kaiju threat.

programme.title: Kick-Ass
